Appetizers.name: Cucumber Compilation
Appetizers.description: create the perfect taste that fits into your diet program with this delightfully delicious combination of your choice of freshly sliced deli meat sandwiched between cucumbers with a spread of garlic and herb cream cheese

Appetizers.name: Array of Fries
Appetizers.description: indulge in fried favorites with a shareable platter of fries with a blend of house seasoning, crispy onion rings, and bite size onion rings

Cold Sandwiches.name: Deli Declaration
Cold Sandwiches.description: This wrap really makes a statement. Fresh sliced turkey wrapped with spinach torillas with homemade hummus and tangy avacodo dressing and a choice of cheese

Cold Sandwiches.name: CSS, Classic Style Sandwich
Cold Sandwiches.description: Create your favorite flavor with all the classic choices of homemade bread, meat of choice, and toppings of choice

Desserts.name: Fullstack Fruit
Desserts.description: the sweet indulgence of vanilla yogurt layered with fresh fruit and topped with dark chocolate slivers

Desserts.name: MVP: Most Viable Pie
Desserts.description: The pie with the most crucial ingredients to satisfy a sweet tooth

Drinks.name: Vanilla Java
Drinks.description: Robust flavorful coffee in a class of it's own with a sweet blend of vanilla topped with whipped cream and sprinkles of cinnamon
